metadata.title: Arctic Current Meter Data Collated under ESDIM Data Rescue

creators.name: Atmospheric Research (OAR), Pacific Marine Environmental Laboratory (PMEL)

metadata.description: CM: Current Meters were deployed in the Arctic Ocean and Greenland Sea from 1971-1988. Measures of zonal and meridonal velocities, temperature and salinity were recorded. This data was used to determine ice flow and flow regimes in the high Arctic region.
